channel.title: blog on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in blog on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-122. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock II
item.description: You are given an integer array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day.

item.title: Leetcode-242. Valid Anagram
item.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.

item.title: Leetcode-26. Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array
item.description: Given an integer array nums sorted in non-decreasing order, remove the duplicates in-place such that each unique element appears only once.

item.title: Leetcode-27. Remove Element
item.description: Given an integer array nums and an integer val, remove all occurrences of val in nums in-place.

item.title: Leetcode-28. Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String
item.description: Given two strings needle and haystack, return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack.

item.title: Leetcode-49. Group Anagrams
item.description: Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order.

item.title: Leetcode-88. Merge Sorted Array
item.description: You are given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, sorted in non-decreasing order, and two integers m and n, representing the number of elements in nums1 and nums2 respectively.

item.title: 將字元轉換成ASCII值
item.description: 以下是幾種方法可以將字元轉換為 ASCII 值： 1. 使用 (int) 類型轉換： char c = 'a'; int asciiValue = (int) c; System.

item.description: Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores.

item.title: Leetcode-121. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
item.description: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the ith day.

item.title: Leetcode-13. Roman to Integer
item.description: Roman numerals are represented by seven different symbols: I, V, X, L, C, D and M.

item.title: Leetcode-58. Length of Last Word
item.description: Given a string s consisting of words and spaces, return the length of the last word in the string.

item.title: Log紀錄
item.description: 之前在寫Android Studio的時候，會使用 Log.d("Patty", "xx功能") 來追蹤程式的執行流程，看有沒有印出的值是否正確或有異常，最近在寫Java Spring Boot，這邊的Log功能，需要先於class中撰寫logger，才可以使用： import org.slf4j.Logger; import org.

item.title: ObjectMapper- Java Object和JSON之間的相互轉換
item.description: 目前在幫ShinyBear品牌做電商網站，在前後端的傳遞資訊時，時常使用到Json，而使用ObjectMapper，可以將Json字串及Java Object互相作轉換。 但注意，要記得在pom.xql中加上spring-boot-starter-web <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency> 說明 ObjectMapper是一個Java庫，用於處理Java對象和JSON之間的相互轉換。它提供了一種簡單而靈活的方法，可將Java對象序列化為JSON格式的字符串，並將JSON字符串反序列化為Java對象。使用ObjectMapper能夠在處理JSON數據時變得更加便捷。 以下是ObjectMapper的一些常見用法(1.2較常用)： 將Java對象轉換為JSON字符串：(writeValueAsString()) ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper(); YourObject obj = new YourObject(); String jsonString = objectMapper.
